page.title: 13The Local Police cont'd
page.content: He finds computers useful to check cars. Using his radio he can find, in 15 seconds, the name and address of any owner. One embarrassing moment he had was when his car broke down and he had to push it to the police station. He had comments from passers by about police having to save petrol. One funny moment was when a swan mistook the wet M5 for a lake and landed on it. All the traffic had to stop while six of his colleagues chased it up the road, arrested it and drove away with it held tightly in the back of the car.
